alert.note: Alert for Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stewart County through 230 PM CDT... At 159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dover, moving southeast at 20 mph. Another storm was located over Land Between the Lakes. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Big Rock, Cumberland City, Land Between The Lakes and Indian Mound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
